name: 劉玉蓀
objective: 本課程介紹各種數位調變技術及應用在調變上的數位訊號處理技術, 如Bandpass signals and systems, sampling theory, power spectral density, pulse amplitude modulation, (PAM), phase shift keying (PSK), frequency shift keying (FSK), 及quadrture-amplitude modulation (QAM), minimum shift keying (MSK), orthogonal frequency division multiplexing (OFDM) 等.
schedule:
1-2週   Bandpass signals and systems
3-4週   Sampling theory
5週     Power spectral density
6-8週   Random processes
10-17週 Passband digital transmission (PSK, QAM, FSK, CPFSK, CPM, MSK, GMSK, OFDM)
materials:
Band –pass fignals and systems       (1) p79—97
Sampling theorem                      已印好

Signal space & Optimal detection rule (2) p370-388

(4) p283-300
